ai.summary: A family-friendly 3.6 km easy forest trail through Gortin Forest, offering a gentle stroll with shaded paths, suitable for all ages and abilities.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently undulating forest track with a mix of dirt and gravel surfaces; some leaf litter and damp patches after rain; occasional roots and steps.
ai.safety_notes: Weather can change quickly in woodland areas; wear sturdy footwear and bring a waterproof layer; stay on marked paths; watch for uneven ground, exposed roots and muddy sections after rain; keep dogs on a lead where required and supervise children; carry a map or have offline navigation and a charged phone.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) offer the most comfortable conditions, with summer providing longer daylight; winter can be muddier and less predictable.
